children.subject: I contacted the dept on a students behalf and the issue is resolved.
I have the same problem with SASIAN 140-001 (24127), for my upper division humanities requirement. Do I have to contact someone to ask for the permission number, and if so, who should I contact?

history.content:
Please contact the dept directly. This may be intentional, or a problem setting up the class (Cal Central is even more complicated on our end) 

Dexter Stewart

Graduate and Undergraduate Affairs

501E Campbell Hall
dexters@astro.berkeley.edu
(510) 642-8520

children.subject: Yes! I contacted Dexter Stewart and it was a problem setting up the class. I am now enrolled in the class. And I managed to figure out that in order to find out the number of the waitlist, I just needed to find the class under My Academics on CalCentral. Thanks again!

history.content: I have two quick questions about class enrollments. How can we find out what number on the waitlist we are for a certain class? And I'm not sure if you can answer this question but its worth giving a shot, I am trying to take astro 7a to fulfill my natural science requirement but I cannot get access to the class even though on their course catalog it shows that they are not reserving seats for anybody, I keep on getting this message when I try to enroll: Department Consent Required. You must obtain permission to take this class. If you have a permission number, select Add Another Class, select the class link, enter the number and resubmit. What should I do?
history.subject: F18 How To View Waitlist Number and Natural Science Requirement
